page.para: I am Ant, and this is my dear friend Dove.
One day some boys came. They had sling/shots.
They want/ed to kill Dove for their din/ner!
This was ter/ri/ble! What could I do?
I am ver/y small, and the boys were ver/y big.
Just then, my dear friend Dove flew down from a tree.
The boys had their sling/shots read/y! Oh no!
Sud/den/ly I had a great i/de/a!
I went to one of the boys, and I bit his foot.
The boy shout/ed out! Dove was star/tled, and she flew a/way.
She called out, “Thank you Ant, my dear friend!”
